38804.summary: Some customers in the West Bay area of West Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38804.title: June 23 – West Vancouver (West Bay) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
